original_text:
Because you rage against me
    and because your insolence has reached my ears,
I will put my hook in your nose
    and my bit in your mouth,
and I will make you return
    by the way you came.
korean_text: 네가 나를 거슬러 분노함과 네 오만함이 내 귀에 들렸으므로 내가 갈고리로 네 코를 꿰며 재갈을 네 입에 물려 너를 오던 길로 돌아가게 하리라 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: and because your insolence has reached my ears,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 오만한 소리가 내 귀에 들렸기 때문에

sentences.original_text: I will put my hook in your nose
and my bit in your mouth,
and I will make you return
